'''linux installers for linux gamers''' (also known as '''liflg'''<ref>{{cite web|url=http://acronyms.thefreedictionary.com/Loki+Installers+for+Linux+Gamers |title=Loki Installers for Linux Gamers - What does LIFLG stand for - TheFreeDictionary |publisher=Acronyms.thefreedictionary.com |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref>) is a website that supplies and builds game installers for [[Linux]] using the [[Loki Software|Loki]] and Mojo setup tools.
The goal of the project is that this will supply a user friendly interface for the use of [[:Category:Linux games|Linux native games]]. Through the use of these tools they also hope to allow older game ports, such as those created by [[Loki Software]], to run better on modern systems. This is accomplished in multiple ways, such as installing legacy libraries alongside the program if needed.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://forum.mandriva.com/viewtopic.php?p=591205&sid=509969472e5fa16b4fe2c5b448b9b4f5 |title=Loki games - Mandriva Forums |publisher=Forum.mandriva.com |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref> The installers also allow users to install some games with all potential patches already applied.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.holarse-linuxgaming.de/news/aktualisierte_installer_f%C3%BCr_%C3%A4ltere_spiele_bei_liflg |title=HOLARSE - Spielen unter Linux - Aktualisierte Installer fÃ¼r Ã¤ltere Spiele bei LIFLG |publisher=Holarse-linuxgaming.de |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref> The project also occasionally releases installers for popular game modifications, such as ''[[Red Orchestra: Combined Arms]]''.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.jesusda.com/docs/juegoslinux/s5/index2.html |title=Jugando con GNU/Linux |publisher=jEsuSdA |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref>
The website once also supplied installers for emulated games using software such as [[Wine (software)|WINE]] and [[Cedega (software)|Cedega]], but eventually abandoned this in [[2007]] to focus exclusively on native titles.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.jeuxlinux.fr/b310-liflg_arrete_les_installeurs_WineCedega.html |title=Jeux Linux - liflg arrÃ¨te les installeurs Wine/Cedega |publisher=Jeuxlinux.fr |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.playonlinux.com/fr/commentaires-36.html |title=La Fin des installateurs Loki |publisher=PlayOnLinux |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref> Some of there WINE based installers can still be found from some other sources.<ref>[ftp://ftp.linux16.net/linux16.net/Games/V2/Installers/ ftp://ftp.linux16.net/linux16.net/Games/V2/Installers/ (liflig installers including their WINE based ones)]</ref>
The project has earned the respect of well-known Linux gaming professionals, such as [[Ryan C. Gordon]] and [[Timothee Besset]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://icculus.org/pipermail/mojosetup/2009-August/000129.html |title=(mojosetup) Loki^WMojoSetup Installers for Linux Gamers |publisher=Icculus.org |date= |accessdate=2010-06-07}}</ref>
